sent.orig: Brand architecture strategy, multi-brand strategy strategy, chief-subordinate strategy, co-brand strategy mixed brand strategy.
sent.trans: 本论文通过研究、分析和应用品牌战略的核心理论和技术路径，确定维科控股集团的公司品牌核心识别和品牌架构。

sent.orig: Strategy management includes strategy planning, strategy implementation and strategy evaluation.
sent.trans: 战略管理包括战略规划、战略实施和战略评估。

sent.orig: It chiefly includes swaps strategy, interest-rate anticipation strategy riding the yield curve strategy and so on.
sent.trans: 互换策略、利率预期策略和收益率曲线策略。

sent.orig: The strategy, moving forward, is a growth strategy not a restructuring strategy.
sent.trans: 今后，公司战略就是增长战略，不是重组战略了。

sent.orig: At last, the article the market strategy, financial strategy and the organizational management strategy.
sent.trans: 最后，本文从市场战略、财务战略和组织管理战略三方面提出相应的子战略实施方案。
